# Line Cap Values

**API Collection**

These constants specify the shape of endpoints for an open path when stroked.

## Overview

Used by [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAShapeLayer/lineCap]. The following figure shows the appearance of the available line cap styles.



## Constants

- **butt**: Specifies a butt line cap style for endpoints for an open path when stroked.
- **round**: Specifies a round line cap style for endpoints for an open path when stroked.
- **square**: Specifies a square line cap style for endpoints for an open path when stroked.

## Constants

- **Shape Fill Mode Values**: These constants specify the possible fill modes for [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAShapeLayer/fillRule].
- **Line Join Values**: These constants specify the shape of the joints between connected segments of a stroked path.
